document.discussion_title: FinnCap Reaffirms “Corporate” Rating for Gresham House Strategic PLC (GHS)
document.topic_text: Tweet FinnCap reaffirmed their corporate rating on shares of Gresham House Strategic PLC (LON:GHS) in a research note published on Tuesday. FinnCap currently has a GBX 1,000 ($12.88) price objective on the stock. Shares of Gresham House Strategic PLC ( LON:GHS ) opened at 835.00 on Tuesday. Gresham House Strategic PLC has a 52 week low of GBX 7.60 and a 52 week high of GBX 843.50. The firm has a 50-day moving average of GBX 9.83 and a 200 day moving average of GBX 9.70. The company’s market cap is GBX 30.79 million. Gresham House Strategic plc, formerly SPARK Ventures plc, is a United Kingdom-based investment company. The Company invests primarily in the United Kingdom and European public companies, applying private equity techniques and due diligence alongside a value investment philosophy to construct a portfolio. Gresham House Strategic PLC Gresham House Strategic PLC
